Package src.main.java.duke.data.task

Class TaskList

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.main.java.duke.data.task.TaskList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Task>
    public class TaskList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Task>
    A list of tasks that does not allow null elements or duplicates.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  TaskList.TaskNotFoundException
      Signals that an operation targeting a specified task in the list would fail because there is no such matching task in the list.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs empty person list.

      Constructs a list from the items in the given collection.

      Constructs a shallow copy of the list.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a list of tasks that is filtered
